cause.description:
This group needs to focus on partying as much as possible...So if you join make sure that you live up two the expectations required! Partying!
The sole purpose of this organisation of people is to gather the youth and party as much as we can. Party!
Some Really Great Parties that everyone should check out! Monsoon Lagoon - Wednesday Nights Vaca Matta - Thursday Nights Casablanca - Friday Nights
For More information JOIN! the Party Animals. Inc Group!
1. To Drink and sheesh and Not to drink and sheesh but to have great time none the less!
2. To attend regular partys and jol at them
3. To keep it gangster while keeping it safe!
cause.name: Party Animals. Inc
